summary: This is a search and seizure warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York, authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy, specifically targeting electronic devices and media containing communications, photographs, and records related to victims and potential victims.

persons.name: Henry Pitman
persons.context: Issued the search and seizure warrant for the premises at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY.

events.title: Warrant Execution Deadline
events.description: The search warrant must be executed on or before this date, as commanded by the court.

events.title: Warrant Issuance
events.description: U.S. Magistrate Judge Henry Pitman issued the search warrant for 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The search warrant targets Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence at 9 East 71st Street for evidence of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.
The warrant specifically authorizes seizure of electronic devices and storage media containing communications, photographs, and records related to victims and potential victims.
The warrant allows for forensic imaging of devices and detailed review techniques, including keyword searches and metadata analysis.
The warrant is related to Case No. 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), indicating it is part of the broader criminal case against Epstein.
The warrant includes authorization to seize items like encryption keys, login credentials, and any evidence of ownership or access to the electronic devices.
